questions.question: The person responsible for coining Endosymbiotic theory.
What is the essence of endosymbiotic theory?

choices.answer: That prokaryotic cells came first and then others were engulfed
That chloroplasts and mitochondria spontaneously appeared
That the Golgi apparatus came first and then the nucleus

questions.question: Photosynthetic bacteria were engulfed by the original cell giving it an ability to take sunlight and make glucose
What did aerobic bacteria become when they were engulfed by the original cell?
One of the pieces of evidence that support Endosymbiotic theory.

choices.answer: DNA of prokaryotic cells is linear like in mitochondria
Mitochondria and chloroplasts have double membranes
Mitochondria and chloroplasts are bigger than prokaryotic cells
There is no evidence, Lynn Margulis just dreamed it

questions.question: Which is NOT  a piece of evidence that supports endosymbiotic theory?

choices.answer: DNA between prokaryotic cells and mitochondria is similar
The size of prokaryotic cells and mitochondria cells is similar
Mitochondria and chloroplasts have double membranes
Mitochondria and chloroplasts have no DNA
